inclusion.criterion: Participant presenting with an episode of palpitations or pre-syncope
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant's underlying ECG rhythm during these episodes remains undiagnosed after clinical assessment.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Palpitations or pre-syncope present during an admission ECG
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Frequent episodes (i.e. at least once a day)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, but recent episode of VT suggests undiagnosed ECG rhythm.
